issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description: When reading from a stream that isn't readable, or writing to a stream that isn't writable, it appears that iOS throws an exception, while Android catches the exception and calls the callback with the error. We should handle this consistently.
fields.summary: Ti API: Ti.Stream.read/write error handling is inconsistent

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
